channel.title: Command Dump
channel.description: I was basically thinking of a thread where everyone puts a command in. Just so we have tons of commands. Not surprised if this is locked, but it'll provide alot of commands people would never think of.

item.title: Command Dump
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

This should be a topic! I’ll post my commands when i get a chance

Read full topic

item.title: Command Dump
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

This should probably go in the tutorials section and at the first post should describe how to add commands then every post after has to include a command and if it doesn’t it should be deleted…

I think this is an alright idea…

It will stop a topic being made for people posting a command like ::gp for 10 million gp and random unneeded commands like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Command Dump
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
